author: {'steamid': '76561198250357448', 'num_games_owned': 593, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 624, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1515378255}
review:
Это игра настолько трэшовая, глючная и безумная, что в какой-то момент в неё становится весело играть.

Презрев все законы физики перс и монстры резво несутся по почти вертикальным поверхностям. Так вы узнаете, в кого переродились в следующей жизни коники Скайрима.
Проваливание в текстуры не баг, а часть боевой механики мобов. В вашу же пользу играет их застревание в текстурах, АХАХА, разберемся же один на один, мой кулак и твоя жопа.
Графика ненамного хуже чем в Elex, а смысл тот же: растительность и заброшки с разрушенными мебелями. Там в сундучках вы находите полезности и кусочки лора, в виде записок.
В игре меняется погода и виды недурны, особенно хороша ранняя ночь. Стремительно несутся по небу сверкающие звезды, так я преположила, что судя по вращению планеты, вряд ли дело происходит на Земле.

Единственная претензия к игре - саунд и звук. Кровь из ушей не идет только при мелодии на берегу. А вот все остальные треки вызывают просто дичайший бугурт, такие они бесячие, к счастью, музыку можно отключить в меню.
Но вот со звуками окружения уже сложнее, отключать их неразумно в игре на выживание.
Неважно, как далеко от вас волк: на расстоянии протянутой руки или в нескольких десятках метров, вы в любом случае будете слышать его однообразное рычание, не прекращающееся ни на секунду. Рано или поздно вы не выдержите, найдете и забъете гнусную тварь голыми руками, только бы она заткнулась наконец, но это ничего не изменит, как вы понимаете, моб на острове не один.

Но во всем остальном веселье гарантировано, если вы, конечно, сможете разобраться с управлением при игре с геймпадом. Я смогла и очень горжусь этим :3

author: {'steamid': '76561198355300771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1514566723}
review: Solo puedo decir que es un gran juego, muy entretenido y versátil, apenas empezado te da cosas que hacer y sientes la verdadera necesidad de sobrevivir, de buscar comida, de buscar ropa, de tener algo con que defenderte y mucho más, el crafting se hace muy cómodo y la ambientación de misterio está en todas partes, hay problemas con la IA de los enemigos, y se podria mejorar sus graficos, pero son cosas menores y esto es lo más triste, se ve que por parte de sus creadores, no ha recibido en mucho tiempo el debido cuidado, parches o cosas que lo hagan mejor, quizás en un principio no tuvo el recibimiento deseado, ya que habían otros survivals que fueron más promocionados que este, pero espero que se tome en consideración por la gente que gusta de los juegos de supervivencia, En fin, entretenido, su precio es bueno y más ahora en las rebajas, cómpralo, pruébalo y disfruta :D.

author: {'steamid': '76561198446053012', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1538495085}
review: Да,я рекомендую к покупке данную игру. Я играл в "Радиационный остров" или как вам будет удобно. На планшете . И у меня есть много вопросов к ней , но по части игрового процесса она шикарна P.S. как по мне. Так что быстро пробегусь по её плюсам . Их 3 . 1-ый : графика. на планшете отстой :( но на ПК круть и FPS не просидает и игра не летит ко всем чертям . 2. сюжет. Да, он не иделен но, лучше чем ничего. 3. Управление. Оно для меня лично как нельзя лучше . Но короче смотрите по вашим предпочтениям. И как бы всё, но нет!  Надо сказать про стилистику и.т.д. и я скажу что сеттинг телепортации крут как всегда . Прикольно осознавать что это создано кем-то , да ладно круто! , круто,круто,круто!

author: {'steamid': '76561198308075345', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1067, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 498, 'last_played': 1522524238}
review:
Merece um lugar em sua biblioteca, apesar de aparentar ser um genérico do gênero sobrevivência o jogo nao torna-se comum em relação aos demais jogos desse gênero. A jogabilidade é um ponto positivo do jogo, tudo funciona suavemente e sem engasgos na dinâmica, alem disso, a variedade de itens é algo a ser considerado nesse jogo. O ponto negativo seria o fato de o jogo apresentar incopatibilidade com vários computadores, deixando a maioria dos gamers frutrados ao tentarem joga-lo. não existe um ''multiplayer'', e sim a possibilidade de jogar contra outro player, invadindo o mundo dele.

Com todos os problemas ou não o Radiation Island é uma boa opção para passar um tempo tentando sair da ilha ou se adaptando a ela.

author: {'steamid': '76561198156078582', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1706902194}
review:
I want everyone reading this to keep in mind that this is A MOBILE APP, that was essensially ported to PC.

This game is great for the cost. The Envirnment and graphics are fantastic. I have been a fan of the game ever since i got it on iOS. 
There is so much to do and to explore, the progression of the game is great. At first i was completely unaware of their being more than one island.
The game is actually difficult, military bases and tesla towers are fun to raid. 
The Digging for treasure feature is a nice touch. It is a great way to get items, probably the most efficient way.
The transit locations are a nice touch as it can be difficult to move around.
"Vehicles" that naturally spawn such as gliders and boats are a good way of getting around. I have remembered some of the possitions of these objects to use it to my advantage.

Overall this game is great. Again, keep in mind this was a mobile app simply being ported onto PC. I hope the sequal, Radiation City, gets released on steam as well. I have downloaded it on my iPhone however i have yet to play it yet as I redownloaded Radiation Island and want to complete that first.

author: {'steamid': '76561198246600970', 'num_games_owned': 596, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 9208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 285, 'last_played': 1618910566}
review:
这一个多礼拜以来，最幸福的事情就是回到家里，玩《辐射岛》这款游戏了，有时候明知道明天要上班，却不知不觉玩到了深夜，以至于白天几乎都是昏昏沉沉的状态。《辐射岛》这款游戏不仅有真实的历史事件作为依托，而且在玩法、画面、音效等方面都格外出彩，是一款不可多得的生存大作，在讲这款游戏的时候，大家有必要了解这款游戏背后的故事。不知道大家有没有听说过费城实验，这个事件至今仍有人在寻找真相，甚至有导演还将这事件翻拍成电影!费城实验主要讲的是1943年，美军在费城一艘叫埃尔德里奇号的船上进行强磁场实验，据目击者所说，该实验成功将船瞬移到几百里外的海域，更令人毛骨悚然的是船员或消失不见，或和船融为一体。这个“实验”也涉及到了爱因斯坦的统一场理论，肤浅来讲就是引力场可以扭曲时空。而《辐射岛》里有20座特拉斯塔相互连接形成了巨大的电磁场，这些电磁辐射使得岛上的动植物，包括人类都发生了变异，玩家扮演的是岛上唯一生存着的人类，他的任务就是关闭岛上所有特拉斯塔，而且这些塔都设置了密码，密码竟然还是圆周率，玩家需要按照圆周率每6位数字一组密码的方式去解锁关闭特拉斯塔。虽然说游戏是开放式玩法，玩家可以在辐射岛上自由活动，哪怕是站在海边发呆。但是作为岛上唯一一个幸存者，你要继续生存下去，就需要从最基本的衣食住行做起。游戏的体力系统要求玩家必须尽快找到食物填饱肚子，也是建立在所有系统之上的，昼夜系统使得游戏更贴近现实生活，也提高了游戏难度。当然，游戏中还有任务、服装、钓鱼、装备（枪支刀具）、熔炉（制作食物或合成材料）、多人同台竞技等系统，这些系统都是为了保证你的安全，例如使用机枪扫射行尸或野兽，收集材料制作各种服装、储物柜、熟食、子弹等，还可以制作滑翔机、小船等更高端的设备！又例如体温低、治疗、病毒、骨折等人类在冒险中可能产生的现实问题在游戏中也能体验到！目前游戏有3种模式供玩家选择，大家可以根据自己的情况自由选择模式。超赞的第一人称3D视角画面，场景非常地真实大气，就好像是在现实生活中看到的一样，最明显不过的就算游戏的昼夜系统了，随着时间流逝，画面的光线也在慢慢变暗再变亮，不管是等待黎明看日出还是守望黑夜看星星，抑或是海边那一处篝火，风景都非常漂亮。笔者在玩的过程中经常被画面漂亮的场景所感动，每次都情不自禁找个好角度截图画面，当做是手机壁纸也不错！游戏的场景非常恢弘霸气，地图非常大以至于路痴的笔者经常走错路，这也说明为什么后期玩家需要制作滑翔机、船只、指南针等交通工具了。每座塔之间真是相隔千山万水，玩家可以在这些场景中除了采集各种材料外，还会遇到各种危险怪物，例如狼、老虎、狮子、行尸、日军僵尸等，这些怪物不仅造型同样做得非常逼真，而且更给力的是这些怪物竟然还会采用阵法来围困主角，那个画面实在太给力了！游戏的背景音乐并非固定不变的，前面也有提到昼夜系统，这个系统不仅在玩法画面上有改变，在音效方面也是如此，虽然整体背景画面还是充满冒险刺激的，但是白天和夜晚的背景音乐还是不同，例如白天可以听到小鸟清脆的叫声，晚上则可以听到各种虫鸣声。至今笔者脑海里还不停回放着动物凶猛的厮叫声，骷髅行尸的恐怖声，游泳时的水声，特拉斯塔的电流声，机枪扫射声，弓箭射击声，砍树采矿声，角色惨叫声等，这些音效也同样制作精良，非常逼真，即视感极强，不仅很好烘托了场景画面的真实冒险性，而且能让玩家更快投入游戏的氛围中例如。如果你戴上耳机的话，效果更佳，仿佛你真的穿越到游戏中，体验到全新的挑战！

《辐射岛》这款游戏极其考验玩家对于野外生存常识的了解，主要在于如何合理分配和利用现有资源，让自己获得最大效益。游戏不管是开放式玩法，还是美轮美奂的画面，抑或代入感极强的配乐，都让人耳目一新，不得不玩！所以游戏刚上架不久就获得佳绩和玩家疯狂追捧也是理所当然的事情。如果你喜欢生存类游戏，那么《辐射岛》一定是你不容错过的一款大作。

author: {'steamid': '76561198315385022', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1863, 'last_played': 1666774550}

author: {'steamid': '76561198170399277', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 917, 'last_played': 1579574341}
review: Besides the awkward animations, the game is very fun. The enemies in the game are unique and actually pose a threat. The giant military bases are fun to raid, and it always pays off. The story is pretty interesting and the islands are gorgeous. I wish the developers would add more things to this game, cause after the story there is pretty much nothing to do, and you are basically invincible by the end of the game. If some sort of DLC came out or atleast new zombies, animals or weapons, that would be great.

review: 走过 很多地图，风景是真的美！特别是各个时间段的水面，夜晚的天空，从高处往下俯视大草原！哇 ，还有树林中 阴森的废弃房屋，感觉非常到位。如果可以联机就好了，很想跟自己的小伙伴一起玩这款游戏，看到如此美丽的风景！

author: {'steamid': '76561198066585213', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 535, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 458, 'last_played': 1703058831}
review:
Date of Review: October 6, 2017
Time Played: Nearly 7 Hours
Skill Level: Master

BFYP: You have to complete the story before you can play the multiplayer.

Combat: The overall Combat is quite basic. That's until you dunk off and find yourself being chased by 4 bears with a slingshot and bow. Or a pack of wolves and an axe. or 30 zombies shooting at you with viruses and being chased by 7-8 soliders with 2 hit kill powers.  Even though it is not a 7DTD game, it sure feels like it. Always an enemy, wether man or beast, at least you have a machinegun. 3 hits to kill in hardmode. Not much  to hold off for until they are up you're arse crack. So either play serious when entering combat or die really fast,

Crafting: The crafting is easy as hell. I mean if you don't have medicine by day 5 your way behind, getting an iron shovel and guns is a different story completly. decide to build your house in a Transit zone so that you don't get it destroyed and you can have a crystal converter. Finding the right stuff on the other hand can be hard AF. 

Building: Not hard, really nice of you do it at a Transit so you can always travel there faster and use the converter. The idea of it is their base is too small and you can build it to huge proportions. It is easy to get materials sometimes. Other times not so true.

Story: Not like most games with shit cutscenes and boring none important animation, this has a solid expalantion for eveerything that is happening if you can take 5 hours to finding everything in the journal and taking it to the next level and getting to the center island and activating teloporter.

Enviroment: HUGE MAP, Well crafted mostly. I mean it is huge, and either you boat your way around and through or you use a hangglider and fly over it. Or you can be a loser and run. Your choice, But overall the whole place is well worth the way to play multiplayer...

MP: Have not got that far to unlock it.

Enemies: DON'T FUCK WITH THE BIG GUYS, THEY WILL RAPE THE FUCK OUT OF YOU. 

Overall: Don't get overwhelmed liek you are paying $3 for the best survival game ever. But it helps get your average acheivement score up and lets you see what a mobile port has to offer. I mean come the fuck on. It was before Rust and 7DTD even came out and you get a $3 version of it without loosing anything. It has trading cards and a huge map. Definetly worth the money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061028678', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 1698, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1533, 'last_played': 1505031019}
review:
クリアーしたのでレビュー。

６／１０

良い
・値段が安い
・非力なPCでもそれなりの見栄えのするグラフィックで軽い
・地形は結構作りこまれているし、それなりに広い

悪い
・３島すべて同じ地形
・開発が途中放棄したであろう難易度のやっつけ調整
・難易度の調整が影響してあまり機能しないクラフト要素
・UIの使い勝手がいまひとつ
・敵性モブのAIと動き
・技術的な問題


ゲーム内容
何が起こったかわからないが、いつの間にかに知らない浜辺にいるプレーヤーキャラクターを操作して、事の真相を究明しつつ脱出を目指すサバイバルゲームのようなFP視点・・・OキーでTP視点にもできる・・・のゲーム。

基本はルート＆スカベンジで武器・防具・道具は多少クラフトできる、建物も多少クラフトできる、渇きはないが空腹はある。昼夜の概念がある。

序盤はクラフトで自分の装備を強化したりもするが、中盤以降はマシンガンの弾を作るだけになる。理由は下に書き出しておいた。序盤のお勧め武器は「槍」。投槍なのでかなりの本数を作る必要があるが、連射も利くし威力も高い。近接は当たり判定がクソ過ぎてうんざり。適正モブの「狼」の攻撃を食らう位置でこちらが刀を振っても当たらない。近接攻撃をするなら常にモブに密着することを要求される。

ステルスプレイはない。戦闘では常に正面から戦い、奇襲攻撃などは考える必要のない脳筋ゲーム。サバイバルゲームというよりはハクスラよりなモブの多さとリスポーン頻度もあいまってそうなっている。

夜間はかなり暗くなるので松明等を片手にプレイしたいところだが、手には一つしかアイテムを装備できないのでおとなしく眠って朝を待つのが良いだろう。


ゲームの舞台となる島は４つに分かれており、中央の島を同じ形をした３島が囲むような形になっている。一応、形が放射線系のハザードマークになっているのだと思う。だからといって核ではなくテスラ・・・大日本帝国軍が電磁波だか磁場だかの極秘実験を行っていた架空の島がゲームの舞台。中央の島へは指定の橋を使って渡ることになる。島の中の川や湖、もしくは離れ小島はカヌーで移動できる。・・・グライダーもあるが試したことはない・・・

また、トランジッションというチェックポイントを見つければ・・・地図上では家のマークで、見つけると別のマークに変化する・・・トランジッション間で高速移動が可能になる。高速移動はこの手のゲームでお馴染みのやり方で、敵が傍にいないときに地図の記号をクリックするだけ。それと、高速移動中は時間の流れはないようだ。トランジッションにはベッドも設えてあり、セーブポイントとしても機能する。ただしベッドが利用できるのは夜間のみ。それから、ベッドで眠ると最後に眠ったベッドの位置がプレーヤーキャラクター死亡時のリスポーンポイントとなる。

ストーリー上の目的は中央以外の各島にあるテスラタワー（各島６塔）をすべてオフラインにして、最後に中央の島のテスラタワー（１塔）もオフラインにすること。同じことを１９回やる。実は好きな順番で好きなように遊べない微妙さ加減。攻略にはテスラタワーをオフラインにする「暗証番号＆地図」が必要で、ある程度プレイしているとジャーナルの形で最初の暗証番号＆地図を見つけることができる。そしてそこに記載されているテスラタワーを攻略に向かうと、暗証番号入力装置の傍にジャーナルの形で次に攻略すべきテスラタワーの暗証番号と地図が落ちている。その次も、またその次も・・・と、そのような形で順番に攻略することを暗に求められる。好きな所からできなくもないが２度手間になるだけ。因みに暗証番号は６桁の数字なのであてずっぽうやすべての組み合わせを試す攻略法は通用しない。やってもいいが組み合わせ爆発が起きる。また、すべてのテスラタワーを攻略しなければならないとは作業であり、明らかにプレイ時間を水増ししたもので値段相応のつくりといえるだろう。ファークライ３などのようにストーリ上の攻略すべき敵の拠点とそれ以外の敵の拠点とはなっていない。


非力なPCでもそれなりの見栄えのするグラフィックで軽い＆地形は結構作りこまれているし、それなりに広い
少ない長所だが、無いよりはよい。むしろなければ困る。海沿いや、山間部に設けられた日本帝国軍の基地や農耕小作人の集落など、住み着いているのがゾンビだけだが、コピペにならないように見栄えのするように作られている。地形のポリゴンが荒かったり、雨が建物を貫通したり、敵性モブのアニメーションがいまいちだったりするが、テクスチャーはボケすぎることもなく綺麗。SHIFT押下でダッシュでき、スタミナの概念がなく走り放題で、かなりの急斜面も自在に登れるので移動の自由度が高く、観光目的で走り回るのが気持ちよい。


開発が途中放棄したであろう難易度のやっつけ調整＆難易度の調整が影響してあまり機能しないクラフト要素
この話をする前に少し覚えておいてもらいたいことを。クリスタルという名のアイテムがあり、ゾンビが持っていたり落ちていたりする。クリスタルは変換機というものを使うと様々な素材に変換できる。
１番目の島で最初の頃はそれなりに素材を集めて、自分の装備を強化することに楽しみを見出せるかもしれないが、ある程度プレイすると自分でクラフトするよりもルートやスカベンジで十分に性能の良いアイテムを得ることができることに気がつく。そして、２番目の島に入っての砂浜に落ちているリスポーンしまくる大量のクリスタルと最初のトランジッションの家の中に変換機が備わっていることを目にして気がつくはずだ、マシンガンの弾を大量に作ってトリガーハッピーなプレイを暗に匂わせていることを。また、難易度が急上昇するのが２番目の島で、「調整するのが面倒だからこれで乗り切れ」と開発が調整を放棄している様が目に浮かぶ。実際そのくらいじゃないとかなり面倒でやってられない。それで、そこまで来る間にマシンガンをルートかスカベンジで手に入れているはずなので、もうそれで十分。防具はもはや自分で作る必要もなく、ルートとスカベンジで問題なく揃えられる。攻撃は最大の防御である。実は１番目の島にも変換機はあるが、不便な場所にしかない。しかし２番目、３番目の島は全てのトランジッションの家に備え付けられている。

自分で家を立て、ベッドを施設することもできるが、高速移動の対象とはならないし、トランジッションがそれなりにいい位置に配置されているため趣味で建築する以上の意味を持たない。

島を攻略する難易度を考えると３番目の島は１番目の島とほとんど同等の難易度に落ち着き、最後の中央のテスラタワーの難易度も一番目の島の最後のテスラタワー程度の難易度となっている。島全体の難易度としては２番目の島の難易度だけがなぜか無駄に高く、難易度調整を放棄したゲームだというのが如実に伝わってくる。


死亡時のペナルティ。例えプレーヤーキャラクターが死亡しても、手に装備しているアイテムを一つ失うだけでチェックポイント（最後に眠った場所）に復活。失ったアイテムは地図上の死亡マークの位置に落ちている。ペナルティーが軽いのでマシンガンを何本か手に入れてマシンガンの弾を無限に作れるようになったら、本当に緊張感の薄い脳筋プレイにしかならない。また、武器の切り替え時のタイムラグが数秒あるので武器を持ち代えるよりも、同じ武器でごり押ししてしまったほうが良いことも脳筋プレイに拍車をかける。


敵性モブのAIと動き
動きの早い敵性モブは大回りにプレーヤーキャラクターの背後を取る行動をよくするが、あまりAIの出来が良くないので程よく障害物に引っかかって足踏みをすることがある。
このゲーム自分のダッシュ速度がとても速く、オープンワールドの島々をめぐるのに重宝するが、速度の速い敵性モブも同等の速度で動いており、傍から眺めているとありえない速度で動いていると思える。


UIの使い勝手
ジャーナル・・・マップなども含まれる・・・（ESC/M/L）、クラフト（U）、インベントリー（I）機能的にすべて別物扱いで、各機能毎にそれぞれのウィンドウを開くボタンで使い分ける。インベントリーはIキーで開き、Iキーで閉じられるのに、クラフトはUキーで開きUキーで閉じられない。ストレージへのアクセスはEキーだがこれも閉じるのはESCとか、微妙に使い勝手が悪い。ゲームパッドにも対応しているが、「キーボード＆マウスを持っていない人だけ」がそうすればいいだけの機能で、苦行レベル。

おまけ。地図を見ると島中に×印が記載されているが、そこを掘るとアイテムが埋まっているので、暇つぶしの作業プレイが好きなら楽しめるかも。


技術的な問題
フルスクリーンでのプレイにもかかわらず、バグによりゲーム中に突然ゲーム画面が最小化され、タスクバーに。これが戦闘中に起こるとイラッとするし、よく起こる。
長時間（たぶん５，６時間だったと思う）プレイし続けていると、フレームレートが急激に低下することがある。６０で安定だったのが２０以下で安定に。
クリーンインストールしたwin7 Home Premiumで起動できなくなった・・・何故だ？win10 Homeでは問題なく動く。


その他
出来ることは色々用意されているが、それを生かして楽しめるほどコンテンツがそろっているわけではないし、それらを楽しむようなバランス調整も放棄されている。用意されたゲーム内のメカニックが何一つ生かされなかったゲームというのが妥当な評価だと思える。安いゲームなのであまり辛らつに評価すべきではないと考えているのだが、金を払ってまでして退屈な作業プレイをしてストレスを溜め込まなくてもいいだろうとは思う。それでもゲームの勝手を理解するための１番目の島くらいは楽しめるだろうが。

日本語対応で、しっかり訳されているのでプレイに支障はきたさない。

author: {'steamid': '76561198000112165', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 638, 'last_played': 1502058984}
review:
[h1]Details[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]Pacific grin: lose yourself in this toxic island survival adventure.[/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1238222572
A well-structured game of survival and exploration as you try to assemble a way off Radiation Island, avoiding the marauding gangs of 1950s Japanese Army zombies and bases. A FPS shooter with limited camp-building capabilities, lots of scavenging and some cool vehicles.
[/quote]
[h1]Summary[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]Incredibly playable, nicely placed, achievements all attainable and great fun. highly recommended!.[/h1]
Pros:
- great atmosphere, very good music and wonderfully rendered 'Japanese WWII Military' environments 
- some of the enemies are really scary
- tough-as-nails, but very rewarding
- a game where there is no speaking or dumb cutscene exposition: just kill, find next objective and survive

Cons:
- watch wildlife try and climb mountains after you - LOL
- passwords, seriously? should randomise this stuff otherwise you google it: seemed a dumb way to pad out length of game.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1748253455
[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198027530154', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 788, 'last_played': 1500921329}
review:
Gefällt mir sehr gut. Die Grafik ist etwas schlicht und am Anfang braucht man etwas, bis man sich mit den Resourcen zurecht findet. Aber hat man erstmal seine Grundausrüstung zusammen, geht es ans erkunden der Insel. Man findet immer wieder Tagebuchseiten die die Story voran treiben und die nächsten Ziele festlegen. Ganz gute Atmosphäre und wie ich finde eine gewisse Grundspannung vorhanden. Da ich mich nirgends über das Spiel informiert habe, weiß ich auch nicht im voraus um was es geht und muss alles selbst raus finden.
Alles in allem ein recht nettes Spiel, den niedirgen Preis alle mal wert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152911273', 'num_games_owned': 626, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 443, 'last_played': 1680240589}
review:
Интересный проект.
Игра была портированна с смартфонов.
Хорошая сюжетная задумка "вы принимали участие в Филадельфийском эксперименте, и вас выкинуло в другую параллельную реальность."

author: {'steamid': '76561198011858893', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1494374552}
review:
WOW !

For the price of this game, it is amazing.

I can see myself in this game for a long while.

This would be awesome and I mean AWESOME, if it was an online MMO **without PVP** where people can trade items, etc.

All the open world survival games I have seen have PvP in them.

I been looking for a game like this, that is open world sandbox, MMO without PvP.
Yet this is not MMO. Would be awesome if it was, just for trading, etc.

For the silly low price this game is, most people would enjoy it if they are into open world, walking simulation, survival and crafting.

The crafting is great, the open world and scenery is great.
Killing, well I am testing it on low level, creatures can't fight back. So I can not comment, yet level 2 and 3 are look better when you got to grips with the game, where the creatures fight back, etc, etc.
So I can't really comment on that part, yet if the game so far is anything to go by, I am in for a treat ;)

All I can say is this is an excellent game for the price.

Please, Please, Please, make this an MMO without the PvP, just for trading and grouping, etc.

author: {'steamid': '76561198361658576', 'num_games_owned': 54, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2539, 'last_played': 1537229942}
review:
１年半以上放置して　久々にストアーページ見ての感想
私が買ったときは３００円くらいで　お得だと思ったのですが
久々に見て１０００円超えにはびっくり
ゲームは特にサバゲーはどれだけの時間を費やせるかだと思うので
サバゲー入門としてはお勧めしますが
この値段でしたら　他にいいゲームがあるのでお勧めしません

これは１年半前に書いたものです。

サバイバルゲームというのはどんなものなのか分からず
自分が楽しめるかどうかも分からず
安いゲームがないか探している時に出逢ったのが
このゲームです。
私と同じサバゲー初心者であればオススメです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198078439333', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1495280804}
review: Radiation Island ! Jeu de DINGUE ! J'ai été très agréablement surpris par ce jeu, pourtant si peu chère (3e) est si complet, si riche, si bien optimisé (j'ai un PC pas ouf et il tourne à 60 fps!) et surtout tellement passionant à jouer ! Les loot, les bases avec les tours Tesla et les zombies de tout types, TOUTES les armes et outils disponibles... Je recommande VRAIMENT ce jeu à tous ceux qui aiment les jeux de survie !!! Je le compare à The Forest, qui est un très bon jeu aussi et similaire, mais il coute 15e et Radiation Island est 20 fois mieux ! Sans compet tous les petits avantages de jouablité comme pouvoir regarder son stuff en courant, le déplacement qui est rapide (on passe pas son temps à courir --') puis les Combats sont aussi très bien fait ! Grand Bravo aux développeurs ! J'ai joué que 2h, et c'est déjà tellement bien ! Je recommande FORTEMENT !

author: {'steamid': '76561198072269496', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1507827142}
review:
EDIT: The price is now 9.99. Is it still worth buying? In my opinion, yeah. For 19.99 you can get Rocket League, for perspective. You can get a lot more entertained hours out of Rocket League than this game.

[h1]Before playing:[/h1]
I played this game for a while on iOS and was astounded to find it available on Steam! I loved it on iOS, I'm sure it will be even better for PC. I will update this review when I put more gameplay time into it.

[h1]After playing:[/h1]
So I beat the game and got all of the achievements. The game was great for the price. It only crashed three times in the amount of time it took me to play through the story (seven hours). The third crash set me back a bit (I was working on getting to the last tesla tower).

I do not see much replay value, however, there is likely some fun to be had in continuing playing the open-world portion of the game. There is a multiplayer option with a scarce amount of people who actively play it. If there is anyone on, there is a high chance that they are a hacker. It is also kind of repetitive walking constantly to the radiation towers, it is probably something that takes up a quarter of play time.

[h1]Positives:[/h1]
[list]
[*]There is a cool base-building system that I used, but not much. It can probably introduce a lot of a playtime as it is fun to build and you can do a good amount with it. I may come back to this game just to use it more. It is similar to Rust's base-building.
[*]Graphics are incredible for a game that costed 2.99.
[*]I can run this game with >200 FPS on maxed out graphical settings.
[*]The game supports 144hz, you have to go into the configuration file yourself and set the VSync value to zero, however.
[*]Massive amount of content for it’s price.
[*]Cool animations, the “old rifle” (the bolt action rifle) has a nice satisfying reload animation.
[*]Interesting storyline, based off of a real life conspiracy theory (Philadelphia Experiment)[/list]                            
[h1]Negatives:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Looting is generally bland.
[*]Game seems to have been abandoned by the developers.
[*]In my seven hours of gameplay, I've had three crashes occur.
[*]The multiplayer is bland and I do not think there is a way to communicate with other players but it is better than getting nothing.[/list]

[h1]Other things that should be mentioned:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Not much variety of items (not a big deal.)
[*]Gameplay is somewhat repetitive (most survival games are like this.) 
[*]The multiplayer is also potentially unoptimized. In the short while I played it I noticed that people shake around in place. This may not be the games fault as it could be a result of ping.[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561197968756327', 'num_games_owned': 977, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1503032739}
review:
[h1] Irradiated. Not All Glow Is Bad. [/h1]

Radiation Island is a true gem. For $3, you get a ridiculous amount of content: A full fledged open world survial crafting game with a loose story to tie it all in. It isn't as complicated or deep as a game like 7 Days to Die or The Forest, but this is what make it truly remarkable.  

The game is light on crafting, giving you all the options from the start, with most of your more powerful weapons being found in marked treasure chests on the map. There are base building options for the hardcore, but most will find it easier to fast travel to a home base as soon as night hits. 

The visuals aren't anything extraordinary, but Radiation Island makes up for it with a very daunting and creepy atmosphere. Day/Night cycles and constantly varying weather patterns keep things fresh, while random radiation clouds spring up at random to give the island a feeling of "science and technology gone wrong." Great sound effects compliment it all very well, more so when you play with a decent headset, and keep things spooky.

It's hard to recommend Radiation Island because I find it hard to explain why I enjoy it so much myself. Keep your expectations low and realize this isn't aiming to be next gen by any means. It's great for what it's worth, and I can honestly say I've played similar yet terrible titles at 10 times the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015078685', 'num_games_owned': 424, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 652, 'last_played': 1691557114}

I definitely recommend buying even for the price it is listed at.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057433697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1487486761}
review:
No os dejeis engañar por el precio y/o los gráficos (que no son del todo malos, la verdad). Hay juegos de este género mucho mas caros con mucho menos contenido, y para ser un juego pensado para dispositivos móviles... hasta tiene historia!!! está bastante bien. Típico survival con crafting, con "criaturas" afectadas por la radiacción y con la obligación de conseguir los códigos de cada torre para intentar lograr acabar con dicha radiacción. Con posibilidad de crear casa aunque personalmente no lo recomiendo, ya que tarde o temprano cambiarás de isla y volver a la anterior se haría pesado.

Contras? si. Para mi gusto, aunque tengas la opción del viaje rapido en ciertos puntos, caminar de A a B se puede llegar a hacer tedioso.
Y por otro lado las IAs... son bastante malas dependiendo la criatura.

En general un buen juego con bastante entretenimiento y por este precio... no se le puede pedir más

author: {'steamid': '76561198033374332', 'num_games_owned': 1282, 'num_reviews': 264, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1486673695}
review:
Вы устали от робинзониады? Устали искать еду и убивать зомби, чтобы выжить? А добывать ресурсы и собирать из палок, веревок и батарейки устройство, которое в реальности собрать под силу только китайским инженерам по чертежам умников из силиконовой долины? Наверняка устали, но вам все ещё хочется поиграть в нечто подобное. Вот вам Radiation Island, чтобы эту охоту отбить.

Как ни странно, если вы ярый фанат всего вышеперечисленного, то вы явно будете чувствовать себя в своей тарелке. Не жалко выкинуть чуть больше доллара, великолепно, это крошка ваша. Вас будет ждать умопомрачительная история о герое, который согласился участвовать в таинственном эксперименте. Суть его заключается в том, что вас отправляют на остров, где бродят дикие животные и жуткие зомби, а в заброшенных руинах разбросаны данные о том, что произошло с островом.

Конечно же никаких скучных поисков истины с невероятными сюжетными твистами, никаких леденящих душу ужасов, поджидающих вас в глубине острова, только самый настоящий увлекательнейший поиск ресурсов для строительства бесхозной хижины, охота за тонущими в текстурах животными и отстрел мутных типов, напоминающих с виду зомби.

Продумана до мельчайших деталей анимация рубки, колки, стрельбы и крафта, продумана так, чтобы ваши глаза не отвлекались ни на что лишнее. Всего пару однообразных элегантных движений и дерево ваше, всего пять-шесть деревянных бумерангов и крокодил переворачивается, корчясь от боли в предсмертной агонии. Конечно, агонию вам понадобится пофантазировать, потому что на глазах ваших эта рептилия просто отлетит немного в сторону, нарушив пару законов физики, тем самым ознаменовав свою кончину. Только не расслабляйтесь, ибо за углом вас может ждать месть от его собрата, который притаился в текстурах в ожидании жертвы.

Вся эта радость упакована в восхитительной красоты графику. Статичное голубое небо и нежные белые облака не раздражают глаза лишними пестрыми оттенками, если же вы скучаете по неожиданным эпилептическим фокусам, то на острове расположены специальные вышки, которые пропускают огромных размеров электрические волны, рассекая небосвод по ночам. Так прекрасно, когда разработчики думают об игроках. Великолепная архитектура японских рыбацких деревушек и голый бетон военных баз прекрасно контрастируют на фоне зеленых полей и высоких, не поверите, коричневых деревьев. Вокруг резвые зайцы и спокойные камни, которые в отличие от первых не убегают от вас. Спустя несколько часов начинаешь задумываться, а не этот ли остров называют «Райское наслаждение».

Radiation Island манит вас своей ценой, освоенным и возведенным в абсолют жанром выживания в компании зомби. Если у вас все ещё возникает вопрос, стоит ли поиграть в эту игру, то мой ответ однозначный: "Да! Это лучшая песочница-робинзониада для Android'а". Ах да, она ещё и в Steam есть, но тогда читайте этот обзор наоборот.

Кураторство - http://store.steampowered.com/curator/5763270/

author: {'steamid': '76561197983952515', 'num_games_owned': 352, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 644, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 563, 'last_played': 1486267539}
review: This is the first exploration/survival game I've tried, and I picked it up becuase it was only ~$3.  Wow, this may be the best purchase I've made in a while.  Super fun.  It took me a while to figure out how to sort of survivie and what I could craft, but I never felt lost or punished for exploring and the game makes it reallt clear where you can and should go as you're learning.  There is no level system, just better gear you can find/make.  After a little more than 7 hours in, I feel like I am well equipped to suruve and really begin to push out and explore without worrying about running away from things.  I am really enjoying this game.  I would say that the soundtrack, while wonderfully atmospheric only contains about 15 minutes of unique music, so prepare for it to loop, a lot.  Aside from that, this is simple to get into a slighlty more complex as you explore the world.  One note, you can click on the 'compass' looking icons on the map to fast travel, took me forever to fiure that out.  But I would recommend this game for sure.  Real fun and I keep coming back to it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974244450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1504438145}
review:
This is a hidden gem. For £1.99 I was not expecting much but the video looked interesting and it had many positive reviews so I thought I would give it a go. I'm hooked on it. The simplicity of the interface works for me and I love the lack of starting inventory slots. Makes you plan ahead on what resources you are going to need. Anyway, inventory space can be expanded by "upgrading" your backpack.

Must be played with headphones. When that claw turns red and the music kicks in it's panic and brown trousers time.

Give it a go. For a survival horror it's dirt cheap and fun to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006516101', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 1124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 943, 'last_played': 1485720888}
review:
Не буду вам врать игра плоха во всем.Графика "вырви глаз"- уровня игр двадцатилетней давности.Звук ужасен.Анимация существ хромает на обе ноги. Хотя что уж, там вся анимация такая. Дизайн островов настолько дешевый и примитивный что на нем просто отпечаталась коленка разработчика на которой он его разрабатывал. Геймплей изобилует несуразностями.И ко всему этому добавьте букет всевозможных багов и глюков. 
Почему же тогда я её советую? Да потому что несмотря на все это в неё интересно играть.Да эту игровую механику мы видели не раз и не два, но она работает.Притом разработчики и не позиционируют игру как ААА проект, а продают её по очень приемлемой цене. Свою цену отбивает слихвой.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984079948', 'num_games_owned': 1563, 'num_reviews': 436, 'playtime_forever': 716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1485014014}
review: Az egyik legjobb túlélős játék, amivel eddig játszottam. Egyedi hangulat, kicsit nyomasztó... aránylag könnyű benne érvényesülni, nem halsz meg minden percben. De, ha igen, kb akkor sincs semmi. A mobok kicsit bugosak, már ami az útvonalkeresésüket illeti, de néha jobb is, mert ha felállunk valaminek a tetejére, könnyebb lelőni őket. Így is azért van, hogy meghal az ember. Kicsit az inventory mérete bosszantó, de lehet fejleszteni, bár nem túl sokáig. Szóval egy nagyon hosszú útra nem lehet elindulni, mert valamiből nem tudsz eleget vinni magaddal, bár közben is lehet szerezni dolgokat, csak hát el kell dönteni, hogy harcolsz és akkor kell a töltény, vagy keresgéled pl a csákányokat stb, amivel meg majd tudsz töltényt csinálni. De még 8 óra játék után így sem lett nekem annyira unalmas, 1x mindenképp végig akarom vinni. Főleg, hogy került 3 euróba? ne viccelj már, a 20 eurós RUST egy rakás szar ehhez képest, mert fél perc alatt idegesítővé válik a farmolás. Meg ha jól láttam ez eleve telefonra lett csinálva... szóval le a kalappal. A grafikai Design is tök jóra sikerült néha egész jól néz ki, de lényeg, hogy az összhatás azérteléggé egyben van Ajánlani tudom csak azoknak, akik szeretik az ilyesmit és nem baj, ha egyedül kell játszani, bár azt írja, hogy ha végig visszük, akkor a moboktól szerzett kristályok segítségével fel lehet csatlakozni a többi játékoshoz és pvp-zni is, bár az a gyanúm, hogy az tenné tönkre az egészet csak... főleg, ha még ebben a viszonylag noname játéklban is csalnak...

author: {'steamid': '76561198000661176', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4931, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2326, 'last_played': 1513536217}
review:
元がスマホのゲームなので、最初はPCでノートのページをめくる操作がわからず、いきなり序盤からつまづいたのですが、サポートの迅速・丁寧な対応のお陰ですぐに問題なくプレイできるようになりました。

アクションが苦手なので上手くできるか心配でしたが、操作が単純で、冒険モードで遊んでも意外と大丈夫でした。
アクション以外にもクラフトや探索要素がしっかりしているので、のんびりやりたい人でも十分楽しめると思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198174488661', 'num_games_owned': 173, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 604, 'last_played': 1682580988}
review: This is one of the best games i have ever played. The lore/story is completely original. The graphics might not be so good but is makes the game more fun. It has realism in almost all genres of living in the wild (exept the zombies). Except for minor bugs this game is worth a lot more than it costs. Thank you (the creator I mean) for making such an awesome game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198309892557', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 1303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 912, 'last_played': 1528826093}

author: {'steamid': '76561198105205197', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 3919, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1260, 'last_played': 1638405569}
review:
This game is like the illegitimate child of far cry and minecraft pocket edition. Most of the time you're going to be crafting weapons, armor, and ammo. The rest of the time you're killing zombies. This is a cool game. 


With that being said, there is room for improvement. The controller controls suck, but you do have the option of customizing them. The game is tedious when you're starting out. It takes forever to get a foot hold in the game, but once you do the game is easy. I'm sure the developers will make improvements here and there. (They just added steam trading cards today.) 


Here's a few tips: Early on, stay on the beach and search the buildings for supplies. Make leather armor for yourself ASAP. You'll have to fight a few zombies before you get the good supplies. (Once you get the industrial pickaxe, or titanium pickaxe, go mine more titanium that way you'll be able to keep mining and build your ammo reserves.) Have fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198286017559', 'num_games_owned': 2641, 'num_reviews': 416, 'playtime_forever': 368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1484166118}
review:
Like other players, I expected nothing from this game, but dude, I'm impressed, a price tag like this you can't really expect much, but I got a lot out of it. 

You start out with nothing, but that will change as you go through your world on an adventure looking for resources to collect, animals to kill and food to consume, you can either go through land or swim through the dangerous creatures, literally a ton of things you can do in this game, even a crafting system that's not too hard to get your hands on, I loved exploring the big spacious map and it's multiple environments.

It's recommended to every fan of the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975048221', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1317, 'last_played': 1485293253}
review: so I bought this game I did not expect to much as the game was so cheap turned out to be  bigger than I thought. It was. a great game along with being very stable but dont expect cutting edge graphics. The game has a story in the form of logs, you can craft and must fight your way across the islands. I found this game to be far more fun than a lot of games I have bought last year even bigger titles.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974078112', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1482813068}
review: Seriously...it's like a $2.99 cent game with a complete survival experience packed in. If you've played even a handful of the seemingly endless Early Access survival titles on Steam, this game will shock you with several features you've never seen before: functional graphics, stable engine, it's -complete!- and a full release title, and it has an actual plot and direction. My wife is much, much more in to these weird survival titles than I am and she finds it a fun diversion when Ark flakes out on her, Graphics are nice, and the worst I can say is that they are "Unity Engine" quality as this was an iOS game originally....but don't let that deter you, for the price it is absolutely a steal. Solid B+. And if you solve the island mystery it apparently unlocks a multiplayer edition, too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105050723', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1105, 'last_played': 1709216160}

author: {'steamid': '76561198155688967', 'num_games_owned': 50, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 547, 'last_played': 1683066174}
review: 这款游戏 我以前在手机上玩过 后来听说有PC端   就专门在steam入正 希望有更好的体验。画质绝对是不错了 日夜循环 饱食度 骨折流血砍树 食物 武器制作一切生存游戏的要素都有了 但是对于PC的优化还是不完美甚至提示还有部分移动端的操作   手机上通关之后可以联机 但这个不行的 所以通关之后我就再也没玩过 希望更新出更多联机玩法 价格也不贵适合平民玩家  画质呢 可以说在高山上截个图可以直接当桌面 小细节还是做得不好 海边的浪花和沙滩闪烁严重 背景BGM也是诡异的让人压抑 声音开大很刺激   开局比较有意思 但是获得了机枪之后就比较简单  游戏动物狩猎有孤岛惊魂3的影子 总体推荐

author: {'steamid': '76561197974628967', 'num_games_owned': 1461, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 2510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1657, 'last_played': 1514874273}
review:
Une histoire mystérieuse, un univers primitif et futuriste. Vous êtes seul, sur un ensemble d'îles, vous devez survivre et tenter de régler la situation que vous ne connaissez pas vraiment.

[h1]Histoire[/h1]
Aucune naration, vous devez explorer les îles et plusieurs emplacements pour trouver des segments d'un journal de l'un des derniers survivants, du moins c'est ce que je crois. Il explique, page par page, des éléments sur les îles. Un ensemble créé par l'homme pour des recherches scientifique (la raison classique). Un ensemble de tour ont été créé pour permettre aux îles pour rester rassemblé et en mer. Vous devez les désactivés, car elles causeraient des changements importants.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
Vous devez survivre, les îles renfermes des dangers, le froid, les animaux et les zombies. Fabriquer vos armes, vos médicaments et vos vêtements. Trouver des coffres pour obtenir des éléments un peu plus rare, ou pour le rangement.

Vous pouvez construire des maisons (mais inutile), mais 'dautres éléments, comme un fourneau, vous permettera de transformer des minéraux en matériaux (plomb, acier et titane). Couper des arbres, des arbustes, frapper la roche, tous est utilisable, ou presque. Vous pouvez même pêcher!

[h1]Design[/h1]
Oublier le travail 3D dans les texture, ont ce retrouver avec un moteur a gros détails, surement du pour alléger la map vu que c'est un immense Open World. Un cycle jour/nuit simple et une rotation de l'environnement (clair, pluie, brumeu).

Le design des personnage est très limite et peux varier, deux animaux pacifiques; lapin et mouton, quatre animaux dangereux; crocodile (ou alligator), loup, tigre et ours, 4 ennemis "humain"; zombie, soldat fou, prisonnier zombie, scientifique mutant, ce dernier est également disponible en version MEGA sur l'île centrale. Leur AI est très basique (entre dans leur zone ou tire dessus, il se dirige stupidement vers vous).

[h1]Durée de vie[/h1]
Malgré la piêtre qualité du moteur, il est intéressant d'y jouer, apprendre la mécanique et avoir confiance en vous pour explorer de plus en plus la map. Vraiment intéressant le concept de ramasser pour s'équiper, mais vite ont passe les armes faibles pour que créer munitions, hache de qualité et vêtement de qualité, ont ignore vite le silex, les plantes, etc... car ont trouve abondamment des éléments dans la map pour tout faire, ou presque. Les minéraux et le bois seront votre priorité, après avoir rammasser un maximum de cuir pour agrandir votre sac au maximum.

Une seul îles peut ce faire en 2-8 heure de jeu, selon si vous être "cible direct" ou "randonneur". Plusieurs choses sont absent de la map, ce qui ammène souvent à vouloir explorer un petit viilage, un chalet, une usine....

[h1]En simple ?[/h1]
Intéressant pour le prix, le design du jeu fait penser qu'il existe une version mobile, qui doit être vraiment plus difficile. Le jeu va à votre rythme, et vous pouvez passer des heures à explorer. Une fois la mécanique apprivoissé, vous irez beaucoup plus vite ce qui vous nuirra peut-être, mais qui va rendre le jeu répétitif rapidement. L'absence de AI efficace, d'arme de qualité et manque de raffinement dans les menu et l'absence de sauvegarde manuelle rend le jeu un peu irritable. Au sujet de la sauvegarde, il le fait automatiquement, mais je ne sais pas quand, j'ai beau quitter après une "nuit", ont dirait qui oublie les 5-10 minutes avant. Alors conseil, passer une journée (jeu) a rien faire avant de quitter pour tout sauvegarder.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070930881', 'num_games_owned': 656, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1625969041}
review:
Так так так, что тут у нас? Бюджетная выживалочка портированная с ведроидов.
И вы знаете, не такая уж и плохая.
Возможности конечно не как в топовых играх, но свою цену оправдывают.
Вполне обширная карта, присутствует крафтинг, и всякие привычные следовательно сборы ресурсов, лазанья по заброшенным домам и базам со сбором лута.

Здесь вполне все разжевали до мелочей, от, как говорится, Condoms до Батона.
Нужно просто открыть блокнот и почитать, но у нас народ какой? Лениый, и до этого дело не доходит ( Обычно у школьников, или тупых Ослов )
Вообщем в это можно без проблем, с интересом играть, исследовать, крафтить, лазить, зомбяшек убивать, предворительно почитав блокнотик.

Вполне себе годно, за свои 80 рубликов.

Ах да, и самое наверное главное:
Графоний, учитывая что это юнити, приятный, и по крайней мере не такой уж чопорный, а местами и приятен глазу, вообщем нормально.

Да еще один поскриптум:

В игре, как пишут в том же блокноте ( Я знаю, что похож на зануду ), говорится, что если собрать, или открыть какой то портал, то можно попасть в мультиплеер, короче, я не проверял, может сказка, а может и нет.
Пробуйте сами.

А игре готов поставить твердую четверку, за все её плюсы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198248519670', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 844, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 844, 'last_played': 1481084547}
review: The main selling point of the game is its price. The graphics are terrible, there are some bugs (doesn't affect gameplay), and the pathing of the hostiles are pretty crappy (zombies move in twitches is the main one). But for 3 bucks all these flaws are neglible.  The game offered me a good 9 hours of gameplay and then the rest was pretty repetitive. The beginning when you're exploring and getting a hang of the game is the best part. Towards the middle when you have armor and find a gun, it's fun to explore dangerous territory and actually make progress in the story. The ending of the game is awfully boring though.The best equipment will be found in the middle game and in abundance, which makes the game pretty unbalanced in the end. I can't remember how many times I died in the first half of the game, and then all of a sudden I never died again. The ending was also a big disappointment. A big disappointment... But again, it's only 3 dollars for 9 hours of fun which is a pretty good ratio for a surivial game. I don't regret buying the game at all, I only wish they'd work on the ending a lot more.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096006499', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1492437173}
review: Well what can i say this game is fantastic value at £1.99 and i would have been happy with it paying £9.99 it runs good has a cool and original story and is fun to play my only issue is the floating white action icons which nobody really needs and you get hungry way to quick . If you have never played a survival game but want to see what they are about then this is your game and if you have played alot then this can make a nice wind down game or a fun sunday morning disstraction just make sure you play on survival mode . I can only score this 10/10 the game is good the issues at the moment are just down to my own personal prefernce and its has to be one of the best value games ever made unless you play F2P without ever paying for anything .

author: {'steamid': '76561198008771737', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1482195007}
review:
This game is the sleeper survival game of the year. How did I miss this at release? smh Love graphics, the movement, the controls. Gorgeous landscapes, unraveling story through discovery. There is a tutorial that is really good and crafting is with the best of them imo

Parts ive disliked:

walking on the water floor is the same as walking on land. Water collide is meh

Zombies and animals are repetitive and redundant. Tigers, sheep, bears, and rabbits. wtf? I know its a created island but it needs some more.

could use a real mix of people you would find on an island like this that are zombies. They dont match the environment as they were short changed by comparison graphically, i.e. 7Days horrible zombies

Im a zombie whore what can I say.

Excellent game for the price. You would be foolish not to get it.

BTW the biggest open world game. If you think this is a small map, its because you are looking down while you are sitting there typing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988689492', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2574, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2458, 'last_played': 1609030224}
review:
The price doesn't justify how good this game is. There are many challenges and dangers. If you think you're safe walking around during the day, think again. You may just come across a floating black mass that drains you of your radiation suit, chest armour, pants, boots and helmet and then your eventual death. My advice - when you see this black mass......RUN the other way amd keep running because there's next to no chance you can outrun it if you're too close.

The music is appropriate for the situation you're in. When there's danger, music intensifies, when it's peaceful around you, the music is mellow. One of the nest attributes of this game is the weather pattens. It changes a lot from clear skies to rain to fog and adds to the gameplay nicely.

The crafting system is simple and there's an ubudance of resources all over the island and you won't starve to death travelling on foot,

I really hope the devs add more content to this game because it's a diamond in the rough and up there with the more expensive crafting games.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972930825', 'num_games_owned': 3213, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1482018344}
review:
This is not a well polished game as some of the reviews claim. All of its features are functional, but buggy. You can build houses, but as far as I can tell there's no point given that if you stop moving for a split second you die. I'm giving this a thumbs down for now, but I'm going to keep playing it. The developers seem nice and responsive so with some improvement I'll change it to a thumbs up. 

Here's how I spent 75 minutes.

Left "tutorial area" and got attacked by 4 wolves.
Got chased by a bear.
Got chased by 4 mountain lions.
Got chased by two wolves that were themselves being chased by a crocodile.
Got attacked by 5 mountain lions.
Got attacked by tiger.
Got chased by zombies.
Got chased by a pack of zombies being chased by a bear.
Found houses on the water.
Felt safe.
Checked inside boat house.
Boat house had mountain lion inside.
Got chased by mountain lion.

My advice to the developer:

A) Dramatically scale back the number of things that can kill you.
B) Add deadly birds and sharks so that I never have to stop being chased.

There are multiple difficulty options, and the game should run well on even very old PCs. The price is perfect of not a bit generous so if you're curious it might be worth your time.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993289615', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 570, 'last_played': 1481562560}
review:
So a mate of mine wanders into my stream on twitch and says check this game out, its only £1.99 called Radiation Island. I'm like "Oh dear how bad is this going to be" but still watch the videos for it and think actually that doesn't look too bad. So I take a punt and am playing it in 30 minutes, my review....

I've been playing alot of 7 Days To Die recently hence the recommendation for a similar genre game, Radiation Island is the best value for money on Steam atm in my humble opinion. It reminded me abit of ark (no dinosaurs) in looks, the crafting is so easy to get to grips with its almost idiot proof. It looks alright, zombies are abit Plants N Zombies but thats ok, the others certainly make up for it. Theres animals to go kill and harvest for their skins and meat, plenty of material grinding to be had, base building nice and simple, no messing. Its even got the Minecraft option to sleep at night so you don't get chewed up by the wild creatures that are bolder and nastier during dark hours.

Seriously folks, if you've got £1.99 to spare and like your survival games get this you will not regret it.

Co-op coming in the future apparently and active devs in the community, good to see.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971971658', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1474, 'last_played': 1481470502}
review: Very nice survival game. Despite not having top-notch graphics the gameplay is quite good. There is a lot to do here - base(s) building, resources gathering, island exploring, treasure finding, hunting, crafting. Enough for many and many hours of play, and when you get bored, you just progress through the main story and finish the game. If you focus on main objectives you can finish the game quite quickly, several hours I'd say (provided you have stocked up decent amount of ammo before). Downsides... The exploration aspect is quite fascinating at the beginning but after you aquire the best guns and craft enough ammo it stops being that interesing. Again, once I ran out of things to do, I just went through the story and finished the game. All in all - very nice game, especially considering the price. I'm glad I stumbled in it. Recommended for those who are interested in survival/crafting games and are not very demanding in terms of graphics (I like nice looking games, and this one is Ok in my book, nothing fancy but decent enough). Apparently it has multiplayer, but I didn't try it, and singleplayer was quite satisfying for me. P.S. Oh and it has 3rd person view, I found out it within couple of minutes before the end :), accidently pushed "O" button.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101782718', 'num_games_owned': 446, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1481387145}
review:
Bof, le concept est intéressent mais l'Ia est à la ramasse, les bruitages sont pas ouf voir absent, tout comme la " Musique" juste un bruit de fond qui devient vite insupportable ( enlever au bout de 10 minute de jeu ). L'inventaire et le menu ne sont pas très intuitif. Après pour 3 € on va pas trop chipoter. Après graphiquement, il reste quand même bien moche et pique les yeux.
Je mets un pouce rouge mais après au vue du prix, il peut être pas mal si vous êtes pas très regardant.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979820843', 'num_games_owned': 698, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1483296531}
review:
This one took me by suprise. I put on on my follow/wishlist simply because I am a sucker for survival games. When I saw the price point my heart sank as I thought that this was just another one of those asset flip cash grabs. After reading some reviews I decided to give it a shot. I figured I would only be out $3.00. 

This game completely suprised me. It is a lot more polished than what I expected for an inexpensive early access game. The physics and gameplay are solid. The story is interesting (reminds me of Lost). 

Get this game. Support this good development behavior. We need more like this on Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212049288', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 395, 'last_played': 1484821129}

author: {'steamid': '76561198061392101', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 478, 'last_played': 1587592103}
review:
Like others have said, this game is a Diamond in the Rough, I stumbled on this game and saw all the positive reviews, and I've been wanting to try a survival game, but I don't like wasting my money on expensive, unfinished (and often abandoned) Early Access games, and looking at the $2.99 price tag on this game, I figured I'd give it a try.

For the price, the game is quite fun, and while I've only got 7 hours play time, I've done quite a bit in the game, but I'm trying to establish a 'home base' while exploring a little farther each time during my exploration of the island.

If you've ever wanted to try a survival game, give this one a try, for the $2.99 price tag, you'll get a LOT of gameplay out of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198258422208', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 475, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1493841163}
review:
Wow where do i begin?
This game is very worth the £1.99 I paid.

The graphics are great and easy on the eye and is not heavy on your system cpu and other requirements on high settings!

The game play is smooth not glitchy I have not come across bugs yet there is only one thing that bugged me and that was the fact it could rain indoors???

Great crafting setup I like the hints but they can get annoying but there is a way to turn them off.
Fight and engadging enemy/environment is simple such as hack and slash.

WHAT IT NEEDS: 
More character integration/creation.
Being able to interact with furniture such as chairs tables/beds etc.
Create colour for garments created.
Customization
Upgrading
Defence/Trap/Turret base implementation.
Animal taming / mounts.



Even without these things I mentioned it rocks but I'm sceptical as i was told at the end of completion there is multiplayer...? ^_^

author: {'steamid': '76561197970418173', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1481010468}
review: This game is incredible; I'd have gladly paid more. It combines open-world island exploration akin to the original Far Cry, with basebuilding from Fallout 4, the atmosphere from the Stalker series (with anomalies and all!) all neatly packaged and really fun to play. only 1.5 hours in, but I had to post a stub for further blah. more later.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014704153', 'num_games_owned': 366, 'num_reviews': 234, 'playtime_forever': 5032, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4806, 'last_played': 1494914966}
review:
I love survival games and it's rare to find a finished one, there are too many survival games that have been in alpha for 2 years or more and never get finished and end up being half arsed disapointments. And generally cost $15+ for a EA game that I wish I didn't buy.

Radiation Island is a rare finished survival game, I was surprised that it was only $3.
The game is very good, I find it fun and enjoyable without it being overly difficult, I like that Iam given a choice with the difficulty lvl, adventurer the normal difficulty is perfect for me, though it gives the option of a harder difficulty or easy for those who just want to explore and not have to fight anything.

I love gathering, crafting and building, exploring, fighting zombies, animals and uncovering the story.

This game runs very well on my PC and it should considering I have a high end PC.

There's a few things that could be added or improved, such as even with a roof on your building it rains inside your house. It should not rain inside buildings, that is just strange.
I see buildings that are in the game, built by the military or scientists have fences around them, but there is no option to be able to build fences yourself.

I highly reccomend the game if you like, building, exploring, survival and want to play a finished game.
It's worth playing.

in this island.

Then....Guys for 3 euros/dollars is a total no brainer. You can't be disappointed at all

author: {'steamid': '76561197996040791', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1480691183}
review:
Черт возьми, да это шедеврально xD за ничтожную сумму вас закидывает на "когда то" обитаемый остров где проводили военные испытания. Вам предстоит е просто носится оголтело в поисках пищи, и переодически от нее, а узнать трагическую историю его поселения и постораться выбраться от туда. Много крафта ожидает своего кузнеца, начиная от плавки-жарки в печи и заканчивая постройкой дельтоплана. Дикие животные, зомби и различные аномалии будут идти за вами по пятам. Рыбалка, охота и кровать на пляжу- все что нужно для отдыха! Активируйте свой первый телепорт вместе с нами)) И вроде даже с помощью магических кристалов можно переместиться в сетевой режим, но уйдете ли вы от туда живым неизвестно! 
Единственный гребанный минус это провал картинки в черные дыры, но это редкость. 
З.Ы. В дальнейшем обзор будет редактироваться!

author: {'steamid': '76561198040749571', 'num_games_owned': 1204, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1481291873}
review:
[h1]日本語でプレイしたい方への注意[/h1]
言語設定がゲーム内にもあるため、Steamで日本語にしたうえでゲーム内の設定からも日本語を選ぶ必要があります。この設定がアップデート等で初期化されることがあるため、突然英語になってしまったなどの症状がある場合はご確認ください。

[h1]レビュー[/h1]
ゾンビあり、狩りありのサバイバルゲーム。
メインシナリオが用意されていて島をめぐりながら謎を解いていく。
フィラデルフィア計画によってパラレルワールドの島に迷い込んだわけですが、どうやら人の住んでいた痕跡があるようです。

ゲームのプレイ感はやさしい世界のARKといった感じです。
恐竜は出てきませんが。
難易度が3つ用意されてるので好みに合わせて選べます。

出血や骨折をしたりそれをアイテムで治療する、空腹時に食べ物をとる、寒さに備えて火を焚いたり毛皮をはおるなどの必要十分なサバイバル要素を体験できます。銃が死に武器になってないので思う存分使ってください。

資源収集はかなりやさしめで、重量の概念が無いのでインベントリスロットさえ増やせば大量に運搬できます。採集ポイントのリポップも比較的早め。いい道具がすぐに揃えられるのでそれをを使えばすぐにアイテムがたくさん集まります。
クラフトも特定の設備やレシピが必要なわけではなく、メニューを開けばどこでも作れます。
(鉱物の精錬や食料の調理は例外的に特定の設備が必要)

キャラの成長要素はしいて言えばインベントリスロットくらいなので気軽にプレイできます。

建築要素もあり、スナッピングでの拠点作成ができます。
(ARKやFallout4のあのタイプです)

[spoiler]序盤注意しなければならないのはスプリントしてくるタイプの敵です。ライオンやカタナ兵士は油断すると間合いを詰められてごっそりHPを持っていかれます。あとは放射能汚染区域の探索はアイテムを準備していないといけません。[/spoiler]

グラフィックに関してはもともとはスマホ向けにリリースされていたゲームのためか美しいと言うほどでありませんが、見劣りするレベルではありません。むしろ軽快に動作しているのでグッドです。

ゲーム内の特定のアイテムにマルチプレイに関してほのめかすテキストが見られますが、これはおそらくモバイル版にもともとあった要素だと思われます。現状マルチプレイができるのは確認できていません。(がもしかしたら今後実装される可能性はあります)

やさしい世界でサバイバル・建築ゲームがやりたい人、メインシナリオに興味がある人、動作が軽快なサバイバルゲームを求めている人に強くおすすめします。

author: {'steamid': '76561197991680641', 'num_games_owned': 980, 'num_reviews': 151, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1482188771}
review:
Radiation island é um jogo de sobrevivência bem promissor, lembra um pouco o Rust no sistema de farm e construção um pouco mais limitado porém interessante mesmo assim. A ambientação é mais misteriosa te fazendo sentir medo em vários momentos durante a noite, Os gráficos são bons e o som é imersivo e bem psicodélico em alguns momentos. O jogo peca um pouco na jogabilidade, os inimigos são travados em alguns momentos e o personagem corre pra caramba mas nada que impeça a diversão. Para um jogo com o custo de menos de 7 reais ele está muito bem trabalhado e merece o nosso incentivo, estou fazendo uma série dele e para quem tiver a curiosidade de ver o jogo em ação basta clicar no vídeo.

Vídeo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yKl8wUA6eGs

author: {'steamid': '76561198028481704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1480550101}
review:
スマホ移植のゾンビサバイバルゲー。なんと日本語入り。
プレイ感としてはFarcry3に7DaysToDieとかのゾンビサバイバルゲーを足して2で割ったような感じ。サバイバルゲーによく入っているシステム(昼夜変動、採集、クラフト、精錬、建築、温度、バッドステータス、乗り物)がてんこ盛りで300円ながら結構本格的な作り。レベルやperkの類はなし。
スマホマルチゲーにありがちなUIと操作性の最適化具合が惜しいところですが、まぁショートカットとキーコンフィグも完備してるし許容範囲かなーと。
デスペナはないっぽいし値段的にも気軽に遊べるサバゲーだと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198096902146', 'num_games_owned': 436, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1480681667}
review:
辐射岛原本是ios独占，居然移植到了pc上（安卓也发售了），可见游戏的反响。
我一直认为，手机游戏移植到pc端上肯定要雷，因为大多数厂商是直接移植，不做任何修改，但是辐射岛的制作组不仅做了优化（三年前的联想AMD笔记本都能跑到20fps+），而且将手机端的触屏改成了键位。
再来说说游戏的价格，同价位的生存游戏里不可能找到第二个。

麻雀虽小，五脏俱全，这就是辐射岛

author: {'steamid': '76561198095047588', 'num_games_owned': 335, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1570609052}

author: {'steamid': '76561197960364629', 'num_games_owned': 4356, 'num_reviews': 292, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1481244920}
review:
[h1][b]Steal of a Deal ! [/b][/h1]

Man what a game for the price ! This game looks real good and runs good also . Think a cheap version of Far Cry 3 with crafting lol . The game is set up like most survival games, so if you own some you will get the swing of this game fast . This one feels like a relaxing game or a beginners survival game meaning that its got a good level settings and the game is real easy to learn and master. It also has a good bit to explore if you are into that.

One thing i have to say for a EA game and for its price this has to be one of the best EA games ive played in a bit . So far i have not come across any major bugs or issues or game brakers! So hats off to the Dev or Devs ! 

Also one thing i like about this game is story think Philadelphia Experiment and also you get your Zombies in this one also and a nice little mystery at play so you can finding clues and stuff on the island and about the island :) 

If you like these type of survival , crafting and exploring games i say get this game ASAP for this price its a steal !!

author: {'steamid': '76561197966468965', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1480618720}
review: Might be the best mobile port to date. I own this on IOS, the mouse and keyboard work so much better here. It's a good survival game, with an actual story and there is a end, you can actually beat the game. As a matter of fact, you have to beat the game once on single player to unlock multiplayer. But it's still a survival game with bases and crafting and such. It you like survival games, I'd definately recommend this one. Especially at only $3. They are charging the same price as it is in the mobile stores, so kudos on them for that. The only way you can even tell that this is a mobile game is the menus are a little wonky, and there is no main menu, the game just starts but you get used to it. Key bindings seem to work well also.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982224916', 'num_games_owned': 313, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 676, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1679711943}
review:
Radiation Island is a fantastic game. I've been playing the Mac version for a couple of years now and this looks to be a nice port. 

The game was originally designed for iOS, but it turns out to be one of those rare gems that makes mobile gaming look good. There's no DLC, no micro-transactions, none of that nonesense which gives contemporary gaming a foul taste in the mouth.

For 3 bucks, you are getting a surpringsly deep and feature complete survival game.  (Thumbs up to Atypical Games for keeping the same price!)

Here's the game - You find yourself on an island, now survive. This means:

* You must disable towers on all the islands
* Fight the irradiated inhabitents and the psychotic animals
* Yes, there are zombies
* Nightime can be very painful
* You must explore ancient WWII ruins

The game has crafting and base building as well as a story that actually ends vs playing it until you get bored.

The game also has multiplayer but you have to beat the game in order to play it. It's just a simple deathmatch game which isn't that intriguing. 

If you are interested in seeing it in action, I made an entire Let's Play series on it. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=62EFxiz3aJE&t=7s

author: {'steamid': '76561198039474757', 'num_games_owned': 577, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 468, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1525290020}
review:
Also das Spiel hat schon was, und für gerade mal 3 Euro, das ist mehr als nur OK, ich hätte auch 10 ausgegeben, gut es ist kein Grafik Knaller, aber mir ist so wie so das Gameplay wichtiger als Grafik, und das Spiel macht echt richtig spaß.

Es sind noch viele sachen die verbessert werden müssen, und ein Multiplayer Modus fehlt auch noch, und mehr Crafting Objekte müsste es noch geben, und der Baumodus muss noch ein wenig überarbeitet werden, Objekte passen sich noch nicht richtig an den Böden an, und Boden an Boden klappt auch noch nicht so ganz, und die Sicht ist beim Bauen zu eingeschränkt

author: {'steamid': '76561198141710784', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 599, 'last_played': 1481356224}
review:
Well, this game is a diamond in the rough. As a huge fan of survival games, you just can't beat something like this. Especially at it's price point. It is a freaking steal. 

I went into the game with very low expectations. Survival games have been becoming very cliched. This game, also, is your typical survival, but what makes this different is there's an end game. What's the reward when you complete the game? Multiplayer! That is pretty cool for its genre. 

The game does have a story. Very small so far that I have seen. You come in on a ship and happened upon an island where experiments were or is being ran. The mission is to make it to the center and turn off teslas so your life can go back to normal. But you must survive, grind, and craft so you can prepare for the threats that lie towards the center. Wolves, bears, zombies, and others I'm sure. When they hit you, it hurts. I had to run back to camp after every melee fight so far. I've learned to fight from a distance. The threats in the game are very much real and resources seem to be very hard to come by. But that brings me to another of why I enjoy this game. To proceed, you must hunt down these creatures that want to kill you. You may need the bear fur or bones, wolf's pelt, zombie may have a weapon. You do what you must to proceed. 

Now the cons.
-There are a few bugs. But they are more nitpicky bugs to me. Nothing to where it is game ruining.
-Time in the day. It's hard to tell how much time you have until it gets dark. From the story in the game, it's dangerous when night falls and I've never been stuck out there to find out how dangerous it is. But when night comes, you have about 20 secs from the moment you realize its dusk til it is completely dark. But it was mention in-game that the island is messing with the day and night cycle so it could be part of the game.
-The map. There's two different maps. One full view of the island then one map that is more zoomed in. I can't move the map in any direction to see when way I need to go. Sense of direction is all messed up for me because the sun seems to be running North and South according to the map.  There's no compass, So i tend to get turned around here and there and have to open my map every 10 seconds. I know I could run straight but the island is full of mountain terrain and threats of the creatures always stop me.
-Melee. It's impossible to melee attack and not get hit back. In other words, no way of dodging theirs. When they hit you, it hurts. 

From those cons, they are more nitpicky cons than actual cons. I could actually say, I haven't experienced one bad moment.

Pros
-Price point. 3 dollars and you get an amazing game. This game is worth more and I appreciate the devs for making it this low to try to get attention.
-Survival aspect. This is par with all the good survival games out there right now. Only difference is it being single player. But I love that.
-The unknown. I can't help but just have the sense of not knowing what is just over that hill. For once, I am happy to fear the things in the woods than to fear a random player killing me for my stuff.
-Last note, price point.

author: {'steamid': '76561198291451046', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1480552924}
review: I love the game! the story is fun and the puzzle will keep you busy. However I would like to see the building mechanics be a little more polished like when you put a stone floor down then put wooden walls the is a very noticeable gap, plus the grass goes through the floor. Now to anyone reading this don't let what I just said scare you into not buying the game, in fact, BUY IT NOW and tell your friends! the requirements are low and the game is cheap and is worth the money. Plus there will be mods soon enough to fix the issues if the developers don't. and if you know how to make mods PLEAS DO or want to learn how to a simple game like this is a great way to start building your skill and a name for yourself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030590674', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 669, 'last_played': 1580366291}
review: 今天发现出了一款自带中文的游戏果断就买了，游戏不错挺好玩的 没那么繁琐，也不贵推荐喜欢生存的玩家可以买下来玩玩，地图够大
